name: BlocksClassic 2
description:
BlocksClassic 2 is a classic block breaking game. BlocksClassic 2 is an awesome game for your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.

- Colorful 3D graphics
- 180 Fun Levels
- Cool power-ups
- GameCenter support (leaderboards and achievements)
- Retina Graphics support
- Universal

Enjoy BlocksClassic 2!
